mapper.select: select t1.username ,t1.nickname ,t2.blog_id,t2.title ,t2.create_date ,t2.synopsis from uts_author a inner join dts_blog t2 on t1.author_id = t2.author_id and t2.state_code = 1001 and t2.title like concat('%',#{title},'%') order by t2.create_date desc
select t2.username ,t2.nickname ,t1.blog_id ,t1.title ,t1.create_date ,t1.synopsis ,t1.text from dts_blog t1 inner join uts_author t2 on t1.blog_id = #{id} and t1.author_id = t2.author_id

select t2.username ,t2.nickname ,t1.blog_id ,t1.title ,t1.create_date ,t1.synopsis ,t1.text ,t1.markdown,dbs.blog_subject_id from dts_blog t1 inner join uts_author t2 on t1.blog_id = #{id} and t1.author_id = t2.author_id left join dts_blog_subject_relation dbsr on t1.blog_id = dbsr.blog_id left join dts_blog_subject dbs on dbsr.blog_subject_id = dbs.blog_subject_id

select t4.username ,t4.nickname ,t3.blog_id ,t3.title ,t3.create_date ,t3.synopsis from uts_author t1 inner join dts_like_blog t2 on t1.username = #{username} and t2.author_id = t1.author_id inner join dts_blog t3 on t3.blog_id = t2.blog_id inner join uts_author t4 on t4.author_id = t2.author_id where t3.state_code = 1001 order by t2.create_date desc

select t1.username ,t1.nickname ,t2.blog_id ,t2.title ,t2.create_date ,t2.synopsis ,t4.subject_name ,t4.blog_subject_id from uts_author t1 inner join dts_blog t2 on t1.author_id = t2.author_id and t1.username = #{username} left join dts_blog_subject_relation t3 on t3.blog_id = t2.blog_id left join dts_blog_subject t4 on t4.blog_subject_id = t3.blog_subject_id where t2.state_code = 1001 order by t2.create_date desc

select t1.username ,t1.nickname ,t2.blog_id ,t2.title ,t2.create_date ,t2.synopsis from uts_author t1 inner join dts_blog t2 on t1.author_id = t2.author_id
inner join dts_blog_tag_relation t3 on t3.blog_id = t2.blog_id inner join dts_blog_tag t4 on t4.blog_tag_id = t3.blog_tag_id
upper(t4.tag_name) = upper(#{tagName})
and t2.state_code = 1001
order by t2.create_date desc
